translationLanguage.description: The BCP 47 language tag of the language that the user wants to translate the text to.

output.description: The result of parsing the text for futher translation.

data.description: Split the text into individual words. Do not include any punctuation and only include symbols, if they are the integral part of a phrase.

text.description: The text of word extracted. Keep this part small, it should not be longer than a typical dictionary entry point. Include only the word itself without any extra symbols. Do not include any punctuation symbols, enclosing parentheses or apostrophes an so on.

translation.description: A short translation of the word without additional formatting. Among several translation choices, choose the one that is the best fitting the original context from the user input text that was sent for this parsing.

languageOriginal.description: The BCP 47 language tag of the language of that word. Null for unknown

languageTranslated.description: The BCP 47 language tag of the language of the translation. It should match the requested 'translationLanguage'

translation.description: The full translation of the text to the requested language.

language.description: The BCP 47 language tag of the language of the translation. It should match the requested 'translationLanguage'
